Package de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Inflater
    Defines the interface, a class, which should allow to inflate views, must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IdInflater
    An inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a resource id.
    InflaterFactory
    An utility class, which offers factory methods, which allow to initialize instances of the type Inflater.
    InstanceInflater
    An inflater, which allows to inflate views, which are present as an instance of the class View.
